Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Grande Albergo delle Nazioni places you in the heart of Bari, convenient to Teatro Petruzzelli and Norman-Hohenstaufen Castle. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Petruzzelli Theatre and Teatro Margherita.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 115 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes, and cribs/infant beds (complimentary) can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including a sauna, a fitness center, and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and wedding services.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. This hotel has 4 meeting rooms available for events. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

A stay at Grande Albergo delle Nazioni places you in the heart of Bari, convenient to Teatro Petruzzelli and Norman-Hohenstaufen Castle. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Petruzzelli Theatre and Teatro Margherita.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Teatro Petruzzelli - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Petruzzelli Theatre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Teatro Margherita - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Piazza del Ferrarese - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Fortino di Sant'Antonio - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
University of Bari - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Provincial Archaeological Museum - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Historic Civic Museum - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Pane e Pomodoro Beach - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Teatro Piccinni - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Bari Cathedral - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Basilica of San Nicola - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Chiesa di San Marco dei Veneziani - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Norman Castle - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Norman-Hohenstaufen Castle - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi

The preferred airport for Grande Albergo delle Nazioni is Bari (BRI-Karol Wojtyla) - 9.8 km / 6.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
